name: backhandedly
content:
Add to word list

in a way that sounds or seems pleasant but may really be unkind or meant as a a criticism: Drama critics backhandedly praised him as one of the most talented and versatile understudies working on Broadway. Other writers remarked backhandedly that they were sure her novel was going to be great since it was taking her a long time to finish it. Related word
